item.description: Hey everyone, I'm holding a Boston marathon Team in Training fundraiser to support the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society on SATURDAY JAN 28th, 7PM-11PM at Bill's bar in the Fenway area (attached to Lansdowne Pub). Stereo Drive-By and a special guest will be playing as well as a raffle with prizes from: NE Patriots, Mount Snow, Skydive Pepperell, Boston Skydive, Matthew Jason photography, Fitcorp US Rafting Maine, Top of the Hub, Cheesecake factory, Boloco, JP Lick’s, Budweiser, Sam Adams, Shipyard Brewery, Green Briar, and more! Don't miss this event and your chance to meet other surfers from the Boston area! More information can be found at the facebook page invite here: http://www.facebook.c... or at my fundraising page here: http://pages.teamintr... Hope to see you all there!
item.name: Bill's bar Boston marathon Team in Training fundraiser
